attributes.action: Make ‘fair trade & vegan’ also mean no slave labour
attributes.additional_details:
Our money creates ‘demand’ we need to know if we are paying for cruelty to any sentient beings.

With every purchase (product/service) you could be endorsing cruelty to animals and humans. We should know how our product/service is made/supplied. The government must demand more transparency on labels of all products/services. Not, just, on animal testing, animal body part or bi-products in ingredients/parts but also human slavery and human suffering.
attributes.background: Clear cruelty free labels on ‘fair trade’ and ‘vegan’ products/services specifying no slave labour in making/providing products/sevices
